@The Ahegao god: Yes. A work of fiction. Hence I prefaced what I said "Let's be real". Because even as a work of fiction there is a limit to how absurd you can take something, and I made a point. Are you really that dense you can't figure out that I chose my words specifically? Also who was talking about logic? I said revenge is just absurdly easy, its not really an netorare story when the whole situation falls apart from a single phone call. I'm not here to discuss or debate or hate or anything about the story other than the fact that it has this rather massive flaw that just makes the whole story fall apart. Its hard to feel bad for the guy, because he can literally destroy the sensei and the girl with little to no effort, revenge would be so easy, there is nothing lost for him here other than basically missing a bullet.

Meh. This is a NTR story, of course it is going to be a horrible ending. 

Love the art btw
